entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this morning then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Thursday 20 April 2023
